task.name: DriverManager_Startup
task.message: Startup of the driver manager service.

task.name: DriverManager_CreateHost
task.message: Creation of a new driver host process.

task.name: DriverManager_ShutdownHost
task.message: Shutdown of a driver host process.

task.name: Host_Startup
task.message: Startup of a new driver host process.

task.name: Host_DeviceArrival
task.message: Loading drivers to control a newly discovered device.

task.name: Host_PnpOperation
task.message: Pnp or Power Management operation to a particular device.

task.name: Host_Shutdown
task.message: Shutdown of a driver host process.

task.name: Installation
task.message: Installation or update of device drivers.

task.name: Fx_PnpOperation
task.message: Pnp or Power Management operation to a particular driver in a device stack.

task.name: Performance_Coinstaller_Device_Installation
task.message: Performance measurement for installation or update of device drivers.

task.name: Performance_Coinstaller_PreDevice_Installation
task.message: Performance measurement for predevice install phase.

task.name: Performance_Coinstaller_PostDevice_Installation
task.message: Performance measurement for postdevice install phase.

The device %2 (location %3) is offline due to a user-mode driver crash. Windows will attempt to restart the device %5 more times. Please contact the device manufacturer for more information about this problem.

The device %2 (location %3) is offline due to a user-mode device crash. Windows will no longer attempt to restart this device because the maximum restart limit has been reached. Disconnecting the device and reconnecting it, or disabling it and re-enabling it from the device manager, will reset this limit and allow the device to be accessed again. Please contact the device manufacturer for more information about this problem.

The device %2 was unable to start due to conflict between the settings for driver %5 (%3 - %4) and the other drivers. Windows will not be able to start this device. Please contact the device manufacturer for assistance.
